The owner is responsible for what an animal does. It's totally your behavior, whether you have a good dog that minds well and is not a problem to society or you turn it into a vicious animal that will bite the mailman, the girl next door or grandma walking down the street, Michael Hansen said. Betsy Adevai, 50, of Grand Rapids, Mich., said muscle dogs have become status symbols for young men who walk through her inner city neighborhood.

Sen. John McCain ( R-Ariz.) gave a curt response Thursday to reports that former defense secretary Donald Rumsfeld had some unkind things to say about him in his new book, Known and Unknown. Thank God he was relieved of his duties, John McCain href="http://blogs.abcnews.com/george/2011/02/sen-John McCain-John McCain-fires-back-at-Donald Rumsfeld-Donald Rumsfeld-memoir-thank-god-he-was-relieved-of-his-duties.html#tp" target="_hplink"> said on ABC's`` Good Morning America,'' after admitting that the two had had a contentious working relationship that often caused them to butt heads over Iraq war policy. We are continuing the search and will find more, Zahi Hawass told Reuters.
